issue.title: [Archery] "archery benchmark run" dumps JSON on stdout
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14851](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14851). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I have been seeing this recently, not sure why it didn't manifest before.
JSON should be output only if the `--output` option is given.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14851?focusedCommentId=17449136) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11766
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11766>
